alert.note: Alert for Bay; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tuscola, southeastern Bay and Saginaw Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saginaw, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall and winds possibly in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Zilwaukee and Bridgeport around 1250 PM EDT. Saginaw around 1255 PM EDT. Frankenmuth around 110 PM EDT. Reese around 115 PM EDT. Vassar around 125 PM EDT. Fairgrove around 130 PM EDT. Caro and Mayville around 145 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Nelson, Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Tuscola, Colling, Wisner, Ellington, Buena Vista Township and Gera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
